author: Fextralife
description:
Valor Mortis Gameplay FIRST LOOK - New First Person Soulslike
In this Fextralife video, I'm going to be talking to you guys a little bit about Valor Mortis, which is a new soulslike first-person game. That's being developed by One More Level, who are also the developers of Ghost Runner and Ghost Runner 2. 

Timestamp:
0:00 Valor Mortis Gameplay Impressions
1:06 Valor Mortis Playtest
1:56 French Revolution Setting
2:49 Soulslike game
4:29 Combat
5:24 Boss Fight
5:57 Level Design and Exploration
7:06 My Thoughts
